QuestData.Title: Totemic Research
QuestData.Description: As we entered the village, I couldn't help but notice yaungol totems lying around this camp.$B$BI have a suspicion that there are dark forces at work here, and those totems may be the key to drawing them out.$B$BCould you bring me some of these totems for further inspection? I would like to study them.
QuestData.CompletionText: I do believe the totems could be of use to us.
QuestData.RewardText: I was right! These totems were once used to store and conduct immense magical energies.$B$BI do believe I can use them once again to do the same.
